## Review focus (CodeRabbit + human)
- Prioritize bugs in Odoo ORM usage and recordset handling.
- Validate access rights and safe `sudo()` usage.
- Check compute fields and `@api.depends` completeness.
- Confirm constraints vs onchange correctness.
- Flag N+1 queries and per-record writes.
- Focus on correctness over style.
